Namespace Detail

debug

Method Detail

  • <static> debug.assert(condition, message, useDebugger)
    assert which actually try to stop the excecution if debug.assert.useDebugger is falsy, throw an exception. else trigger the debugger. It default to false
    Parameters:
    {Boolean} condition
    the condition which is asserted
    {String} message
    the message which is display is condition is falsy
    {Boolean} useDebugger Optional
    the condition which is asserted
  • <static> {Function} debug.breakpoint(originalFn, conditionFn)
    Trigger the debugger when the function is called
    Parameters:
    {Function} originalFn
    the original function
    {Function} conditionFn Optional
    this function should return true, when the breakpoint should be triggered. default to function(){ return true; }
    Returns:
    {Function} The modified function
  • <static> debug.checkInstanceof(baseObject, property, klass)
    Ensure the type of a variable with instanceof
    Parameters:
    {Object} baseObject
    the base object containing the property
    {String} property
    the property to check
    {Object} klass
    the expected class
  • <static> debug.checkType(baseObject, property, klass)
    Ensure the type of a variable using typeof or instanceof depending on klass
    Parameters:
    {Object} baseObject
    the base object containing the property
    {String} property
    the property to check
    {Object} klass
    the expected class
  • <static> debug.checkTypeof(baseObject, property, typeofString)
    Ensure the type of a variable with typeof() operator
    Parameters:
    {Object} baseObject
    the base object containing the property
    {String} property
    the property to check
    {String} typeofString
    the exepected result of typeof(property)
  • <static> debug.checkValueRange(baseObject, property, callback)
    Ensure the type of a variable with typeof() operator
    Parameters:
    {Object} baseObject
    the base object containing the property
    {String} property
    the property to check
    {function} callback
    the function called the property is set
  • <static> debug.fnAttr(originalFn)
    Function attribute builder
    Parameters:
    originalFn
  • <static> debug.noNaN(baseObject, property)
    Ensure that the property is never NaN Inspired from http://29a.ch/2011/10/20/javascript-fuck-nan-undefined by @29a_ch
    Parameters:
    {Object} baseObject
    the base object containing the property
    {String} property
    the property to check
  • <static> {Function} debug.obsolete(fn, message)
    Display a message every time the function is called
    Parameters:
    {Function} fn
    the original function
    {String} message Optional
    message to display when the function is called. Optional
    Returns:
    {Function} The modified function
  • <static> {Array} debug.stacktrace(nShift)
    extract a stacktrace. TODO make it work in node.js/chrome/firefox and modern browsers
    Parameters:
    {Integer} nShift Optional
    number of calls to skip in the stacktrace
    Returns:
    {Array} array of object like {url: "http://*", line : 42, column: 12};
  • <static> {Function} debug.wrapCall(originalFn, beforeFn, afterFn)
    Wrap a function between 2 functions
    Parameters:
    {Function} originalFn
    the original function
    {Function} beforeFn
    the function to call *before* the original function
    {Function} afterFn
    the function to call *after* the original function
    Returns:
    {Function} The modified function
